name: newspack-custom-content-migrator
description: This plugin is a set of WP CLI commands (**Migrator classes**), and scripts (**Recipes**) used during Newspack sites Live Launches and/or Content Updates.

scripts.release:archive: rm -rf release && mkdir -p release && rsync -r . ./release/newspack-custom-content-migrator --exclude-from='./.distignore' && cd release && zip -r newspack-custom-content-migrator.zip newspack-custom-content-migrator
